name: MIS Average Population Summary for a Date Range
description:
The report shows an establishment's population figures for a date range entered at runtime.
Now includes Average figures.
HQ0025 - v1.0 Last Modified: 06/03/2020

dataset.name: Daily Summary
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.DISCHARGE_COUNT, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.DOUBLE_DISCHARGE_COUNT, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.NET_POPULATION, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.TA_OFFENDERS_ON_HOME_LEAVE, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.TA_OFFENDERS_AT_HOSPITAL, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.TA_OFFENDERS_AT_OTHER, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.ABSCOND_COUNT, AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.ESCAPE_COUNT, TO_NUMBER(AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.RECEPTIONS_COUNT) AS RECEPTIONS, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_POPULATION_DATE.MONTH_NAME, AT_POPULATION_DATE.MONTH_NUMBER FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_POPULATION_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_VIEW_POPULATION AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION WHERE (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.DATE_SK = AT_POPULATION_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-03-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('30-06-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_), (SELECT V_GROSS_POP FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_CODE NOT(IN ('KTI','TRN')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_CODE NOT(IN ('KTI','TRN')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_CODE <> 'TRN')

errors.error: instance.report[2].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
